pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Calcium + Vitamin D 150 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Calcium + Vitamin D is a premium quality formula to help support healthy teeth and bone density, and provide a source of calcium which may assist in the prevention of osteoporosis when dietary intake is inadequate.

SWISSE ULTIBOOST CALCIUM + VITAMIN D is a premium quality formula to help support healthy teeth and bone density, and provide a source of calcium which may assist in the prevention of osteoporosis when dietary intake is inadequate.


Bone & Teeth Health: Calcium and vitamin D help maintain healthy, strong bones and teeth. Vitamin D also supports bone density and integrity in aging individuals. The human skeleton consists of 206 bones that provide a framework for the body to help maintain shape, protect vital organs, provide a place for muscles to attach also function as a site for mineral storage.

Osteoporosis Prevention: Vitamin D helps calcium absorption and a diet deficient in calcium can lead to osteoporosis in later life. Calcium may help prevent osteoporosis when dietary intake is inadequate.

Increased Absorption: Formulated with naturally derived vitamin D3 to help the absorption of dietary calcium.

Calcium requirements may increase depending on age, gender, diet, pregnancy, lactation and post menopause.

Suitable For: Bones, Joints & Muscles

Size: 150 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No Added lactose, yeast, egg, soy or artificial flavours.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS: CALCIUM (from calcium citrate) 333.33 mg, VITAMIN D3 (as cholecalciferol) 8.3 micrograms.

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

Two to three tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
